item.title: 宝马计划从 2028 年起向市场投放首款氢能汽车
item.description: 德国汽车制造商宝马公司周四表示，该公司的目标是利用与丰田汽车公司共同开发的燃料电池技术，于2028年向市场推出首款氢动力汽车。【原文：BMW aims to bring its first hydrogen-powered vehicle onto the market in 2028, using fuel cell technology developed with Toyota Motor Corp , the German carmaker said on Thursday.】

item.title: 航空公司如何应对国泰航空空客 A350 发动机故障？
item.description: 本周一，香港国泰航空公司发现有 15 架飞机在飞行途中因发动机部件故障而需要维修燃油管路，随后多家航空公司正在对其空客 A350 机队进行预防性检查。【原文：Several airlines are carrying out precautionary inspections on their Airbus A350 fleets after Hong Kong's Cathay Pacific found 15 planes that needed fuel line repairs following the in-flight failure of an engine part on Monday.】

item.title: 中国碧桂园解除普华永道审计师职务
item.description: 碧桂园控股周四表示，根据房地产开发商的建议，普华永道（PwC）已辞去其审计师一职，这使其成为与陷入困境的审计公司断绝关系的最新一家中国公司。【原文：Country Garden Holdings on Thursday said PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) has resigned as its auditor following the property developer's recommendation, making it the latest Chinese company to sever ties with the troubled auditing firm.】

item.title: 报纸《Trouw》称，俄罗斯公司为使用了 25 年的 ASML 机器购买备件
item.description: 荷兰报纸《Trouw》周四援引俄罗斯海关文件报道称，尽管欧盟实施了制裁，但俄罗斯公司仍能在二级市场上获得 2022 年至 2023 年使用了 25 年的 ASML 芯片制造机的备件。【原文：Russian firms were able to obtain spare parts for 25-year-old ASML chipmaking machines in 2022 to 2023 on secondary markets despite European Union sanctions, Dutch newspaper Trouw reported on Thursday, citing Russian customs documents.】

item.title: 多伦多房屋销售在七月下降后于八月上升，价格下降
item.description: 周四的数据显示，大多伦多地区 8 月份的房屋销售量环比上升，从 7 月份的下降中反弹。【原文：Greater Toronto-area home sales rose in August on a month-to-month basis, data showed on Thursday, rebounding from a drop in July.】

item.title: 美国将斥资 73 亿美元用于农村清洁能源项目
item.description: 乔-拜登总统的政府周四表示，美国将从 2022 年的《通货膨胀削减法案》中拨款 73 亿美元，用于资助由农村电力合作社主导的清洁能源项目。【原文：President Joe Biden's administration on Thursday said the U.S. will spend $7.3 billion from 2022's Inflation Reduction Act to fund clean energy projects helmed by rural electric cooperatives.】

item.title: 摩根大通以 "关税战争 2.0 "风险为由放弃购买中国股票的呼吁
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan）放弃了买入中国股票的建议，警告11月美国大选后可能爆发第二次关税战，并对中国的经济增长表示担忧。【原文：JPMorgan has ditched its buy recommendation on Chinese stocks, warning of the risk of a second tariff war after November's U.S. election and citing worries about the country's growth.】

item.title: 法院顾问称，谷歌对安卓汽车访问权限的限制可能违反欧盟规则
item.description: 周四，欧洲最高法院的一名顾问支持意大利反垄断机构的观点，称 Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司拒绝允许 Enel 公司开发的电动汽车应用程序访问其 Android Auto 平台可能违反了竞争规则。【原文：An adviser to Europe's top court on Thursday sided with Italy's antitrust authority, saying Alphabet unit Google's refusal to allow an e-mobility app developed by Enel access to its Android Auto platform may breach competition rules.】

item.title: 中国敦促美国 "立即 "取消对中国商品征收的所有关税
item.description: 中国商务部周四表示，在拜登政府宣布对包括电动汽车在内的中国制造商品加征关税之前，美国应立即取消对中国商品征收的所有关税。【原文：The United States should immediately lift all tariffs on Chinese goods, the Chinese commerce ministry said on Thursday, ahead of an announcement by the Biden administration on expected hikes in levies on Chinese-made items, including electric vehicles.】

item.title: 富士康称 8 月份营收同比增长 32.81%，第三季度业绩将进一步改善
item.description: 全球最大的合约电子制造商、苹果公司最大的 iPhone 组装商台湾富士康周四公布，8 月份收入同比增长 32.8%。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn , the world's largest contract electronics maker and Apple's biggest iPhone assembler, on Thursday reported revenue for August rose 32.8% year-on-year.】

item.title: 德国工会谈大众汽车：4 天工作制 "可以想象"，将考虑所有方案
item.description: 德国最大的工会是大众汽车监事会成员，该工会周四表示，将不遗余力地提出替代方案，以应对汽车制造商关闭工厂的威胁。【原文：Germany's largest trade union, which sits on Volkswagen's supervisory board , said on Thursday that it will leave no stone unturned in coming up with alternatives to the carmaker's threats of plant closures, with a four-day week as one option.】

item.title: 债权人申请对恒大新能源汽车公司进行清算
item.description: 一名债权人向上海一家法院提交了中国恒大集团旗下中国恒大新能源汽车集团的破产申请，这是针对这家陷入困境的汽车公司的第三份破产申请。【原文：A creditor filed a petition for the bankruptcy of a unit of China Evergrande New Energy Vehicle Group , a subsidiary of China Evergrande Group , in a Shanghai court, the third such petition against the embattled car company.】

item.title: 路透社民意调查：因美联储降息押注，多数亚洲货币看涨押注上升
item.description: 喜忧参半的数据加剧了人们对世界最大经济体经济增长的担忧，增加了美国大幅降息的可能性，玷污了万能美元的诱惑力，因此分析师提高了对大多数亚洲货币的看涨押注。【原文：Analysts have raised bullish bets on most Asian currencies after mixed data heightened concerns about economic growth in the world's largest economy, increasing the odds of outsized U.S. rate cuts and tarnishing the allure of the almighty dollar.】

item.title: 高盛集团称，哈里斯提出的税制改革可能使标准普尔 500 指数的盈利下降 5
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）分析师表示，美国副总统兼民主党总统候选人卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）提出的在 11 月总统大选前提高企业税的建议可能会使基准 S&P 500 指数公司的盈利下降约 5%。【原文：U.S. Vice President and Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris' proposed corporate tax hike ahead of the November Presidential elections could lower earnings for companies on the benchmark S&P 500 index by about 5%, analysts at Goldman Sachs said.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车下调利润率目标
item.description: 瑞典汽车制造商沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）周四下调了2026年的调整后盈利目标，并表示该公司的目标是在2026年之前继续超越高档汽车市场，从而降低了之前的销售目标。【原文：Swedish automaker Volvo Cars on Thursday lowered its adjusted profitability target for 2026 and said it aims to continue outgrowing the premium car market until that year, dropping a previous sales target.】

item.title: 美联储降息在即，美元走软，投资者押注转向
item.description: 由于美联储的降息预期有可能结束美元长达数年的强势，美元的跌势正在加速。【原文：The U.S. dollar's decline is gaining speed as anticipated interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve threaten to end the greenback's years-long period of strength.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车公司将 Nvidia 驱动的软件和 "巨型铸造 "应用于未来的电动汽车中
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）周四表示，未来所有车型都将使用由英伟达（Nvidia）功能强大的芯片支持的单一软件系统，并将依靠 "巨型铸造"（megacastings）来降低电动汽车的成本。【原文：Volvo Cars will use a single software system backed by powerful chips from Nvidia for all future models and will rely on "megacastings" to cut costs for electric cars, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 利率下降难以抵御房地产风暴
item.description: 全球房地产市场因一代人以来最急剧的利率上升而受到冲击，借贷成本的逐步放宽几乎无法缓解市场的压力，市场几乎没有希望重拾推动经济繁荣的自由资金。【原文：Global property markets, rattled by the steepest rise in interest rates in a generation, will get little relief from the gradual easing of borrowing costs, with scant hope of a return to the free money that fuelled a boom.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场在抛售中暂时停顿
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 泰国 8 月总体 CPI 同比增长 0.35%，略低于预期
item.description: 泰国商业部周四表示，8月份泰国总体消费者价格指数（CPI）环比上涨0.35%，上个月的年涨幅为0.83%。【原文：Thailand's headline consumer price index (CPI) rose 0.35% in August from a year earlier, after the previous month's annual increase of 0.83%, the commerce ministry said on Thursday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行行长重申降息时机尚不成熟
item.description: 澳大利亚最高央行行长周四重申，由于通胀率仍然过高，考虑近期降息为时尚早，即使在数据显示经济正在艰难前行的情况下，他仍坚持鹰派立场。【原文：Australia's top central banker reiterated on Thursday that it was premature to contemplate near-term rate cuts as inflation remained too high, sticking to a hawkish stance even as data showed the economy was struggling to motor on.】

item.title: 独家新闻消息人士称，美国警告新日铁竞购美国钢铁构成国家安全风险
item.description: 三位知情人士称，拜登政府周六在一封信中告诉新日铁公司，其斥资 149 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司的交易将损害美国钢铁业，从而构成国家安全风险，这为美国准备阻止该交易增添了证据。【原文：The Biden administration told Nippon Steel in a letter on Saturday its $14.9 billion acquisition of U.S. Steel would pose a national security risk by harming the American steel industry, three people said, adding to evidence the U.S. is poised to block it.】

item.title: 新日铁股价在美国寻求阻止同行收购的消息传出后上涨
item.description: 周四，新日本制铁公司股价攀升，表现优于日经指数，此前有消息称，白宫正寻求阻止该公司以 150 亿美元收购其同业美国钢铁公司（U.S. Steel）。【原文：Shares of Nippon Steel climbed on Thursday, outperforming the wider Nikkei index , after the news that the White House was looking to block the company's $15 billion bid for its peer U.S. Steel .】

item.title: 亚洲股市在全球抛售后试图企稳；关注美国数据
item.description: 周四，亚洲股市在遭遇大幅抛售后试图重新站稳脚跟，而国债反弹则抑制了美元汇率，并推高了日元，因为美国经济忧虑提高了美联储大幅降息的可能性。【原文：Asian share markets tried to regain their footing on Thursday after a steep sell-off, while a rally in Treasuries dented the dollar and lifted the yen as U.S. economic worries raised the odds of the Federal Reserve going big on rate cuts.】

item.title: 前官员称美国经济放缓但仍有动力
item.description: 美国前财政部长罗伯特-鲁宾（Robert Rubin）周四表示，美国经济正在放缓，但仍有一定的发展势头。【原文：The U.S. economy is slowing but it still has some momentum, former Treasury Secretary Robert Rubin said on Thursday.】

item.title: 聚焦：比亚迪全球扩张遭遇日本严峻考验
item.description: 比亚迪正在日本推出电动汽车充电站，并加强市场营销和客户激励措施，旨在提高日本市场的销量，而日本市场已成为这家中国汽车制造商全球扩张的绊脚石。【原文：BYD is rolling out electric-vehicle charging stations and ramping up marketing and customer incentives in Japan, aiming to boost sales in a market that has become a stumbling block in the Chinese automaker's global expansion.】

item.title: 美联储戴利称需要降息以保持劳动力市场健康
item.description: 旧金山联储主席玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周三表示，美联储需要降息来保持劳动力市场的健康，但现在要看即将公布的经济数据来决定降息的幅度。【原文：The Federal Reserve needs to cut interest rates to keep the labor market healthy, but it is now down to incoming economic data to determine by how much, San Francisco Fed President Mary Daly said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 对美联储降息幅度过大的押注不断升温，美元摇摆不定
item.description: 由于交易商加大了对美联储本月晚些时候超大规模降息的押注，美元周四下跌，日元因避险需求而表现突出，因为对美国经济增长前景的担忧再次浮现。【原文：The dollar dipped on Thursday as traders ramped up bets for a supersized rate cut from the Federal Reserve later this month, with the yen a notable outperformer on safe-haven demand as concerns over the U.S. economy's growth outlook resurfaced.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Stellantis 将暂停生产吉普在美国最畅销的两款车型
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，吉普车的母公司斯泰兰特公司（Stellantis）将暂停生产其在美国最畅销的两款车型。【原文：Jeep's parent company Stellantis is pressing pause on making two of its top-selling U.S. models, The Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 投资者权衡需求疲软、欧佩克+可能推迟增产等因素，石油价格持稳
item.description: 在经历了隔夜的抛售之后，石油公司在周四早盘试图守住阵线，因为各方都在努力应对需求疲软以及下个月更多供应可能推迟进入市场的问题。【原文：Oil was attempting to hold its line in early trade on Thursday after an overnight sell-off, as players grappled with weak demand alongside a possible delay to more supply entering the market next month.】
